main_definition: To surpass or go beyond a certain limit, level, or expectation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To be greater in quantity, size, degree, or value than something else.
meanings_and_examples.example: The sales for this year exceeded the company's expectations.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To surpass a limit that has been set as a standard or benchmark.
meanings_and_examples.example: His performance in the marathon exceeded his personal best record by ten minutes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To go beyond what is considered normal, usual, or appropriate behavior.
meanings_and_examples.example: She spoke so loudly at the library that she exceeded acceptable noise levels.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To surpass in skill, ability, or quality relative to others.
meanings_and_examples.example: His painting skills have exceeded those of his peers since he was a child.
